MATCH (a:teams) WHERE a.tag=~'kan|sdg|den|rai' SET a.conference='AFC', a.division='West'
MATCH (a:teams) WHERE a.tag=~'buf|mia|nwe|nyj' SET a.conference='AFC', a.division='East'
MATCH (a:teams) WHERE a.tag=~'cin|cle|pit|rav' SET a.conference='AFC', a.division='North'
MATCH (a:teams) WHERE a.tag=~'clt|htx|jax|oti' SET a.conference='AFC', a.division='South'
MATCH (a:teams) WHERE a.tag=~'crd|ram|sea|sfo' SET a.conference='NFC', a.division='West'
MATCH (a:teams) WHERE a.tag=~'dal|nyg|phi|was' SET a.conference='NFC', a.division='East'
MATCH (a:teams) WHERE a.tag=~'chi|det|gnb|min' SET a.conference='NFC', a.division='North'
MATCH (a:teams) WHERE a.tag=~'atl|car|nor|tam' SET a.conference='NFC', a.division='South'
MATCH (n:teams) set n.label=n.tag
